医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 通过影响精液质量和激素水平来降低男性生育能力研究表明，SARS-CoV-2 通过降低精液质量和改变生殖激素水平，显着损害男性生育能力，治疗后可部分恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/COVID-19-reduces-male-fertility-by-affecting-semen-quality-and-hormone-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/COVID-19-reduces-male-fertility-by-affecting-semen-quality-and-hormone-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8032bc4-bff4-46bf-afcf-08b9611f35b7 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 23:56:00 -0400 COVID-19 reduces male fertility by affecting semen quality and hormone levels
年长的大脑通过重新配置神经活动来适应识别音乐老年人在识别音乐序列时大脑活动会发生变化，这表明尽管与衰老相关的记忆力下降，但仍有助于维持记忆力的补偿机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Older-brains-adapt-to-recognize-music-by-reconfiguring-neural-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Older-brains-adapt-to-recognize-music-by-reconfiguring-neural-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8529415-4ae7-45a4-baa2-7907db29946f Wed, 11 Sep 2024 23:32:00 -0400 Older brains adapt to recognize music by reconfiguring neural activity
研究发现蛋白质增加与阿尔茨海默氏症认知改善有关发表在《大脑》杂志上的一项研究表明，新的阿尔茨海默氏症药物所增加的蛋白质水平至少可以解释认知障碍的减缓以及淀粉样斑块的减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-links- Protein-increases-to-cognitive-improvement-in-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-links- Protein-increases-to-cognitive-improvement-in-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35cbe925-e9b8-4a5a-ad4c-2f743bbaff0b Wed, 11 Sep 2024 23:19:00 -0400 Study links protein increases to cognitive improvement in Alzheimer's
与男性相比，女性服用替泽帕肽后体重减轻幅度更大替泽帕肽（一种欧盟批准用于治疗 2 型糖尿病和肥胖症的药物）的所有剂量均持续降低女性和男性的体重，但根据今年年会上公布的新的事后研究，女性的体重减轻幅度更大。欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD)，马德里（9 月 9 日至 13 日）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Women-experience-greater-weight-loss-with-tirzepatide-compared-to-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Women-experience-greater-weight-loss-with-tirzepatide-compared-to-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1da07ef8-23d7-46ad-bfa2-416ca349b728 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 23:16:00 -0400 Women experience greater weight loss with tirzepatide compared to men
中风幸存者更有可能经历异常的睡眠模式​美国科学院医学杂志《Neurology》在线期刊 2024 年 9 月 11 日发表的一项研究显示，与没有中风史的人相比，曾中风的人可能更容易睡得太多或太少。神经病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Stroke-survivors-more-likely-to-experience-abnormal-sleep-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Stroke-survivors-more-likely-to-experience-abnormal-sleep-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12e1b72f-797c-40ba-9278-0b2698c2b0e2 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 23:14:00 -0400 Stroke survivors more likely to experience abnormal sleep patterns
光污染可能会增加患阿尔茨海默病的风险根据 Rush 的最新研究，夜间室外光可能是阿尔茨海默病的一个重要危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Light-pollution-may-elevate-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Light-pollution-may-elevate-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e72aa2f8-4dd5-40fc-9159-b910fb0b58bc Wed, 11 Sep 2024 23:11:56 -0400 Light pollution may elevate Alzheimer's risk
大笑运动可能是缓解干眼症症状的初步治疗方法《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项来自中国的临床试验发现，笑可能与滴眼液一样有效改善干眼病症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Laughter-exercise-could-be-an-initial-treatment-for-releasing-dry-eye-disease-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Laughter-exercise-could-be-an-initial-treatment-for-reliving-dry-eye-disease-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1f3d648-f5f5-4638-bf68-17b58ba52f5d Wed, 11 Sep 2024 23:08:57 -0400 Laughter exercise could be an initial treatment for relieving dry eye disease symptoms
Molnupiravir 可减轻长期 COVID-19 症状，但对住院治疗的影响有限Molnupiravir 治疗 COVID-19 显示出适度的长期益处，可减轻症状并改善三个月和六个月的健康状况。然而，差异很小，对住院率没有影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Molnupiravir-reduces-long-term-COVID-19-symptoms-but-shows-limited-impact-on-hospitalizations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Molnupiravir-reduces-long-term-COVID-19-symptoms-but-shows-limited-impact-on-hospitalizations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86ca4dfb-9152-4916-8053-bab4650539e3 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 23:03:00 -0400 Molnupiravir reduces long-term COVID-19 symptoms but shows limited impact on hospitalizations
麦吉尔的研究揭示了青少年精神病的妄想模式麦吉尔大学研究人员的新发现可以帮助临床医生了解青少年和年轻人的妄想过程，这表明需要及时干预以防止精神病全面复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/McGill-study-sheds-light-on-delusion-patterns-in-youth-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/McGill-study-sheds-light-on-delusion-patterns-in-youth-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fede2a54-40c7-436e-9a7e-8bbddb6e91a9 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 22:57:57 -0400 McGill study sheds light on delusion patterns in youth psychosis
长放疗疗程显示直肠癌更好的器官保存COVID-19大流行使研究人员能够证明，对于患有以下疾病的患者，在手术前进行长期放疗可能是比短期放疗更好的治疗方法，可以避免手术，保留直肠和肛门，并防止原发性肿瘤的再生长。直肠癌——肠癌的一种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Long-radiotherapy-course-shows-better-organ-preservation-in-rectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Long-radiotherapy-course-shows-better-organ-preservation-in-rectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5b01a83-5d1b-4198-bb2c-38551ebe1bee Wed, 11 Sep 2024 22:51:22 -0400 Long radiotherapy course shows better organ preservation in rectal cancer
